casebody.data:
No. 74646 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 15, 2018

PALOMINO CLUB, LLC, a domestic limited liability company, d/b/a Palomino Club; Hachiman, LLC, a domestic limited liability company; Adam Gentile, an individual; Craig Parks, an individual; and Lacy's LLC, d/b/a Lacy's, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Kenneth C. Cory, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Alexander Potasi, an individual; and Derek Fesolai, an individual, Real Parties in Interest.

DENIED.
